clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Anluohuaxian in the Treatment of Rehabilitation Patients With Corona Virus Disease 2019
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of Anluohuaxian in the Treatment of Rehabilitation Patients With Corona Virus Disease 2019-A Multicenter, Open, Randomized Controlled Study

brief_summary.textblock:
To evaluate the efficacy and safety of Anluohuaxian in blocking the progression of pulmonary
      fibrosis and improving lung function in patients with COVID-19.

detailed_description.textblock:
In clinical institutions that enroll patients with corona virus disease 2019, two arms,
      multi-center, randomized and controlled methods are adopted. Patients are divided into two
      groups, Anluohuaxian combined with regular treatment group and regular treatment group. 750
      patients are expected to be enrolled and the cases are allocated according to the ratio of 2(
      Anluohuaxian combined with regular treatment group): 1(regular treatment group).

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in high-resolution computer tomography of the lung
primary_outcome.description: Changes in ground-glass shadows, interstitial or air nodules found on high-resolution computer tomography

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the scores of the St. George's Hospital Respiratory Questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: St. George's Hospital Respiratory Questionnaire range from 0 to 100. 0 stands for no impact on life and 100 stands for extreme impact on life.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in modified British Medical Research Council Dyspnea Scale (mMRC) scores
secondary_outcome.description: mMRC score range from 0 to 4. 0 stands for wheezing only when exercising hard and 4 stands for severe breathing difficulties.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in vital capacity of the lung
secondary_outcome.description: Adult male vital capacity is about 3,500 ml and female is about 2,500 ml.

arm_group.description: Anluohuaxian: 6g each time, twice a day
